headline: Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. Announces Pricing Of $500 Million Of 5.700% Senior Notes Due 2032, By Host Hotels & Resorts, L.P.
summary: BETHESDA, Md., May 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. (NASDAQ: HST) (the “Company”), the nation’s largest lodging real estate investment trust, today announced that Host Hotels & Resorts, L.P. ("Host L.P."), for whom the Company acts as sole general partner, has priced its offering (the "Offering") of $500 million aggregate principal amount of 5.700% Senior Notes due 2032 (the "Notes"). The Notes are Host L.P.’s senior unsecured obligations. The Offering is expected to clos
